meanings.sent1: The audio from the TV was crystal clear.
meanings.sent2: I love listening to music with good audio quality.
meanings.sent3: The audio of the birds chirping sounded like a symphony.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was an audio delight to everyone around.
meanings.sent5: The audio of the waves crashing against the shore was mesmerizing.

meanings.definition: The recording or reproduction of sound.
meanings.sent1: The audio of the concert was saved on a CD.
meanings.sent2: He adjusted the audio levels before starting the recording.
meanings.sent3: The audio of the cat meowing was played on repeat for laughs.
meanings.sent4: The audio of the rain hitting the roof was like a soothing lullaby.
meanings.sent5: The audio of her voice echoed through the empty hallways.
